summary:
- **Issue of Unquoted Options**: 344,620 new unquoted options (expiring 28-Jul-2029, exercise price AUD 0.00) issued as payment for services rendered.  
- **Placement Capacity**: Issued under 15% placement capacity (Listing Rule 7.1), no shareholder approval required.  
- **Post-Issue Capital Structure**: Total unquoted options on issue now include the new class (344,620) alongside existing unquoted options (details in Part 4.2).  

*No material impact on liquidity or valuation identified (nil-cost, non-dilutive until exercise).*
